ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and what you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And what you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by what you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and what you do not see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of those you do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And by whatsoever you see not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that which you do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and by that you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And all that ye see not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: as well as all that you cannot see:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that which ye see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and what you do not see:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by whatsoever you see not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and all that you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And by what you do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what you do not see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:39] and all that you do not see: of them, in other words, [I swear] by all creatures:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And all that ye see not) people of Mecca; it is also said that this means: I swear by what you see, i.e. the sky and the earth, and that which you do not see, i.e. the Garden and the Fire; and it also said that this means: I swear by what you see, the sun and the moon, and by that which you do not see, the Throne and the Stool; and it is also said that this means: I swear by what you see, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) and that which you do not see, Gabriel. Allah swore by all these.
